TEXTS_CONTROLLER_ERROR_WRONG_ALIGNMENT_S.message: You should start from defining origin text first.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_NOT_READY_FOR_TOKENIZ.message: Document source texts are not ready for tokenization.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_NOT_EQUAL_SEGMENTS.message: Document source texts would be divided to different amount of segments.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_TOKENIZATION_FINISHED.description: An info message that is published after tokenization finished.

ALIGNMENT_ERROR_TOKENIZATION_CANCELLED.description: An error message for tokenization workflow

ALIGNMENT_ERROR_ADD_TO_ALIGNMENT.message: Choose another token please - from the same segment, target text.

ALIGNMENT_ERROR_REMOVE_FROM_ALIGNMENT.description: An error message for alignment workflow

ALIGNMENT_ERROR_ACTIVATE_BY_INDEX.message: Passed index is out of the group list bounds - {index}
ALIGNMENT_ERROR_ACTIVATE_BY_INDEX.description: An error message for alignment workflow

ALIGNMENT_GROUP_IS_COMPLETED.message: Alignment group is finished and saved.
ALIGNMENT_GROUP_IS_COMPLETED.description: An info message that group is completed successfully

TOKENIZE_CONTROLLER_ERROR_NOT_REGISTERED.description: An error message for tokenization workflow

UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_TYPE.description: An error message for upload workflow

UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_WRONG_FORMAT.message: Uploaded file has wrong format for the type - plainSourceUploadFromFile.
UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_WRONG_FORMAT.description: An error message for upload workflow

ALIGNMENT_GROUP_UNDO_ERROR.message: There are no steps to be undone - only one step in history.
ALIGNMENT_GROUP_UNDO_ERROR.description: An error message for undo workflow

ALIGNMENT_GROUP_REDO_ERROR.message: There are no steps to be redone - no steps forward in history.
ALIGNMENT_GROUP_REDO_ERROR.description: An error message for redo workflow

ALIGNMENT_GROUP_STEP_ERROR.message: This type of steps {type} is not defined for undo/redo workflow
ALIGNMENT_GROUP_STEP_ERROR.description: An error message for remove/apply step process

SOURCE_TEXT_CONVERT_ERROR.message: Json file doesn't have all obligatory fields. Source Text won't be created.
SOURCE_TEXT_CONVERT_ERROR.description: An error message for converting from JSON process
